function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High residential density may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within the neighborhood","Impact":"Uncontrolled transmission can lead to widespread outbreak and increased community spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, promoting vaccination, and enhancing ventilation systems in high-density residential areas","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air purification technologies, and smart building designs","People":"Residents living in high-density neighborhoods","Owner":"Local governments, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Disconnected street networks can limit access to healthcare facilities and increase reliance on vehicles for travel","Impact":"Limited access to healthcare can hinder disease management and increase reliance on vehicles can lead to higher transmission rates","Mitigation":"Improving street connectivity, promoting public transportation, and enhancing pedestrian infrastructure for better access to healthcare facilities","Technologies":"Transportation network modeling, smart city planning, and urban design technologies","People":"Residents in areas with disconnected street networks","Owner":"Urban planners, local authorities"},{"Description":"Higher auto-oriented regional accessibility can lead to decreased participation in sustainable and healthy travel","Impact":"Reduced participation in sustainable travel can lead to an increased reliance on vehicles and higher exposure to air pollutants, contributing to respiratory health issues","Mitigation":"Developing alternative transportation options, promoting active travel initiatives, and enhancing public transportation systems","Technologies":"Mobility apps, smart transportation systems, and sustainable urban planning technologies","People":"Individuals in areas with high auto-oriented regional accessibility","Owner":"Transportation authorities, urban planners"}]}
